job description:
RESPONSIBILITIES:

Kforce's client, a leading asset manager in New York, NY is currently searching for a Data Analyst. This data analyst will sit in the company's HR department and use data to drive and improve this world class business. You will use BI tools and systems to provide insights and guide executives. You will have executive exposure. This company has a great work/life balance with a beautiful office.

REQUIREMENTS:
  • 1-2 years of data experience
  • Excel experience
  • SQL experience
  • Collaboration experience
  • Achievement in school
